actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for a Veterans' Administration general medical and surgical hospital at Jacksonville, Fla., and to achieve cooperation with the University of Florida College of Medicine in its activities in Jacksonville.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to construct a Veterans' Administration general medical and surgical hospital in Jacksonville, Florida, and to secure the cooperation of the University of Florida College of Medicine in its training and education of medical students in Jacksonville.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a Veterans' Administration general medical and surgical hospital at Jacksonville, Fla., and to achieve cooperation with the University of Florida College of Medicine in its activities in Jacksonville.
